name: Simpmodal
body:
#simpModal
simpModal is a simple modal jquery plugin based on leanModal by FinelySliced ([Visit their page](http://leanmodal.finelysliced.com.au/)). I built simpModal because I wanted flexibility. Many of the modal plugins I've seen out there rely on lots of HTML markup, which makes them too complex for simple things. Plus, I wanted to be able to code my CSS separately from the plugin, which certainly makes it a lot more designer-friendly. Finally, I wanted the plugin to add/destroy any necessary HTML tags it uses, so that I wouldn't have unnecessary tags flying around my code when a modal isn't visible.

Using simpModal is quite simple and you can start with something as simple as this:
```
$.simpModal({ content: "Simple Message" });
```

***

## Features
* Simple
* Flexible width and height
* Independent CSS
* Ajax Support
* Image Free
* Very light (less than 4Kb)
* Multiple instances on the same page
* Many options
* Very easy to use

### Options
There are many options, but not enough to make it confusing. It's actually quite simple to use them. Take a look at the default options:
```
$.simpModal({
	top: 100,
	overlay: 0.4,
	extraClass: null,
	element: null,
	link: null,
	file: null,
	params: null,
	method: 'post',
	content: null,
	width: null,
	closeButton: false,
	loadingMessage: "Loading...",
	speed: 200,
	transition: 'fade',
	clickEnter: true,
	closeEsc: true,
	close: false
	});
```

## Examples

### Show Close Button
You may want to display a nice looking button:

```
$.simpModal({
        content: "Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat, vel illum dolore eu feugiat nulla facilisis.",
        closeButton: true
        });
```

###Extra Class
You may apply any class to your modal so that you can have multiple modal styles
```
$.simpModal({
        ...
        extraClass: 'narrow'
        });
```

## Support/Contact
That's basically it! If you have any questions/suggestions, just drop me a line: [arthurcamara@gmail.com](mailto:arthurcamara@gmail.com)
